Hopes from the Otago Sparks that their Hallyburton-Johnstone Shield form can carry over to the Super Smash T20 cricket competition
Hopes from the Otago Sparks that their Hallyburton-Johnstone Shield form can carry over to the Super Smash T20 cricket competition
27 December 2024
The one-day leaders - who have won all six games by a bonus point - begin their domestic campaign in the 20-over format this afternoon, when they take on the Canterbury Magicians in Alexandra.
Coach Craig Cumming says his side's mindset remains the same between the two formats.
First ball's at 12:40pm.
